name: Greninja Star
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Masakazu Fukuda

poke_power.name: Shadow Knife
poke_power.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mist Slash
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.
